title: Who is good to climb with?
body:
Still looking for a champ that I feel comfortable with an takes skill, but which champ is good to climb with?
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Depends on your mmr. Ouch 37% win rate though. I suggest no more lucian. If you're stuck on being an adc i would suggest tristana, twitch, vayne, caitlyn, ezreal, kogmaw. If your skill cap is a bit low then i'd say cait and trist are your best bets. As a jungle main who recently broke a 4 seasons hardstuck silver, i played a bunch of warwick, eve, and kayn.
